Translations.Text: O ona cloaked jeden
Meditate night except zriedka
Half z it a maly menej
Al a maly inak read Quran zakryt pokryvka
My dat ona heavy odkaz
meditation o night bol effective righteous
Ona have a lot z lehota dni inaksie zalezitost
Ona commemorate vola sa tvoj Lord pojdem vzdy koniec koniec do Him
Lord z east zapad; there nie bol inak god Him. Ona zvolit si Him tvoj zastanca
A zostat steadfast v the face z ich utterances disregard them do nice chovanie
let Mna deal s rejectors generously zehnat; iba dat them a maly lehota
My have severe punishments Hell
Food ze ledva lastovicka painful retribution
Dni pojdem when zem mountains quake mountains turn into weightless pile
My have sent do ona posol iba mat rad my sent do Pharaoh posol
Pharaoh disobeyed posol consequently my punished him severely
Ona disbelieve ako ona evade dni so hrozny lenze it robit infants gray-haired
heaven shatter therefrom Jeho promise je true
This bol reminder; whoever wills let him zvolit si chodnicek do jeho Lord

Tvoj Lord zauzlit lenze ona meditate two-thirds night half it one-third z it a so robi some z those kto verit ona! GOD ZAMYSLAT night DNI He ZAUZLIT ZE ONA VZDY NIE ROBIT this. He pardoned ona. Radsej ona read co ona mozem Quran. He zauzlit ze some z ona maj bol chory others cestovat pursuit GOD's provisions others striving zapricinit GOD Ona read co ona mozem it observe zmluva prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) lend GOD loan righteousness. Whatever dobre ona send ahead tvoj souls ona zalozit it GOD daleko lepsi generously rewarded A implore GOD forgiveness! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
